title: RHOA star Porsha Williams collaborates on functional and fashionable shoe line with JustFab
text:
Fashion-subscription and lifestyle fashion brand JustFab has collaborated with Real Housewives of Atlanta star, Porsha Williams, on a brand new line: The Georgia Collection.

The collection is made up of on-trend boots, including functional (and cute!) flat styles, high-heel options and cozy winter silhouettes.

And just like Porsha, the exclusive fall offerings are both classy and sassy!

Hot for fall: Fashion-subscription and lifestyle fashion brand JustFab has collaborated with Real Housewives of Atlanta star, Porsha Williams, on a brand new line: The Georgia Collection

Perfect for any occasion: The collection is made up of on-trend boots, including functional (and cute!) flat styles, high-heel options and cozy winter silhouettes

Animal print boots are arguably the strongest trend this season, so naturally Porsha would include them in her line.

The 38-year-old reality star was photographed wearing her designs in the campaign, like only she could.

She styled her brown python over-the-knee boots with a coordinating silk wrap dress, the white high-heel boots with a tie-dye frock, and a rainbow sequin mini with her blue suede creations.

Day or night, The Georgia Collection can inject instant style into any ensemble.

The reality star was photographed wearing the boots for the campaign.

Not your basic boots: Just like Porsha, the offerings are both classy and sassy

Versatile: Day or night, The Georgia Collection can inject instant style into any ensemble

Go wild: Animal print boots are arguably the strongest trend this season, so naturally Porsha would include them in her line
description: JustFab has collaborated with Real Housewives of Atlanta star, Porsha Williams, on a brand new line: The Georgia Collection.
